name: Hexagon Labs
description:
How long will you survive in the test chamber?
Experience exciting adventures with Hexagon Labs. Either alone or with friends in multiplayer.

Survive 15 rounds, upgrade your weapons and defeat the final boss "Geier Guardian". And by the way, try not to let them offend you!

This game was made for the 7dfps 2022 game jam.

NOTE:

  • To play multiplayer you need to forward the Port: 51318 TCP / UDP
